name: Sky City (Non-VR Version)
description:
[Requires Xbox game controller]

"Welcome aboard cadet, prepare to begin exploration mission."

Fly a spaceship around an abandoned futuristic city and look for clues in order to figure out what happened to it's citizens.

Sky City was developed by a team of SideFX game tech interns to showcase how Houdini can be used to procedurally build content for video game environments. The game was developed over the course of seven months using Houdini, Houdini Engine, and Unreal Engine 4.
